Description: Attic black-glazed pottery miniature salt-cellar with concave wall; glazed black throughout (glaze partly worn, partly misfired); rounded incurving rim; rounded foot with concave inner wall; underside recessed and slightly convex.
Curator's comments: These pieces are not easy to date.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.2177)
